prompts.title: Task 1 · Warm up
prompts.question: Where do you live?
examples: I live in a small town near the coast. It’s a peaceful place with friendly people and beautiful beaches.
I live in Lima, the capital city of Peru. I really enjoy its mix of modern life and old traditions.
Currently, I live with my family in an apartment in the city center, which is very convenient for work and shopping.

prompts.title: Task 2 · Studies / Work
prompts.question: Do you study or work? What does a typical day look like for you?
examples: I’m studying engineering, so my days are usually split between lectures and lab sessions, with some group projects in the afternoon.
I work as a customer support rep. I start by checking tickets, then handle calls, and finish with follow-ups for complex cases.
I work remotely. I usually start at 8 am, focus on emails and planning first, then have meetings before lunch, and do deep work in the afternoon.

prompts.title: Task 3 · Free time
prompts.question: What do you usually do in your free time?
examples: I usually read novels or watch documentaries. It helps me relax after a long day.
On weekends I like to play football with friends and then grab something to eat together.
I spend most of my free time learning guitar and practicing songs I like.
